message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, which I believe will be a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay $10000 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $10000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value to you is $15000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am still unable to meet at $13000. I would like to offer $12000 for the product. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13000. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $12500. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on the product is $15000.
